snippet.title: Sungaia Saga - Demo Trailer (Blue Moon Cliffs) - March 11th 2025
snippet.description:
The trailer for the demo of Level 94's upcoming first video game, Sungaia Saga! A 2D action platformer with rhythm elements, hidden secrets and a story split that changes the entire game.

Use the Beat Blade to mimic your opponents' moves by learning their rhythmic vibrations! Mastering different ki elements will help you throughout your adventure to save your captured brother.

The final game is still early in development, but this demo featuring the first level, Blue Moon Cliffs, is out Tuesday March 11th! Your support will help a lot on my way to finishing the rest of the game.

Would love to hear your thoughts!

You can visit https://level94.com for more information on the game. Level_94_Games on social media!

https://www.facebook.com/Level94Official
